TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DragEventHandler(object sender, DragEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DragEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DragEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DragEventArgs)
public delegate void DragEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DragEventArgs ^ e);
type DragEventHandler = delegate of obj * DragEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示處理 之 、 或 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the , , or event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需有關如何使用委派處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範兩個之間的拖放作業控制項。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 此範例會呼叫拖曳動作開始時的方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果滑鼠已移動，拖曳動作會啟動多個期間的滑鼠位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用來判斷要在拖曳的項目索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 此範例也示範如何使用自訂游標拖放作業。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 此範例假設兩個資料指標檔案`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`，在應用程式目錄中，自訂拖曳存在，而不置放的資料指標分別。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 會使用自訂的資料指標，如果`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已核取。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 中所設定的自訂游標事件處理常式。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 鍵盤狀態會在評估提供的權限的事件處理常式`ListBox`，以決定在拖曳作業將會根據 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 鍵狀態。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期間也決定其中將進行卸除`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果不是要卸除的資料`String`，則設定為。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最後，卸除的狀態會顯示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 若要卸除提供的權限的資料`ListBox`決定事件處理常式和`String`值會加入適當的位置中`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果表單的界限之外移動的拖曳作業，則取消拖放作業事件處理常式。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此程式碼摘錄會示範如何使用具有委派事件。This code excerpt demonstrates using the delegate with the event. 請參閱完整的程式碼範例中的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#4)]
